# rectForSearchText(whenCentered:)

**Instance Method**

The rectangle for the search text within the bounds of the field.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func rectForSearchText(whenCentered isCentered: Bool) -> NSRect
```

## Parameters

- **isCentered**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the search field’s components are centered within the control. For more information, see [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSSearchField/centersPlaceholder].

## Deprecated Symbols

- **rectForCancelButton(whenCentered:)**: The rectangle for the cancel button within the bounds of the search field.
